Bibliography

[1]

Sebastian E. Ahnert. Generalised power graph compression reveals dominant relationship patterns in complex networks. Scientific Reports, March 2014. URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.1038/srep04385, doi:10.1038/srep04385.

[2]

Vincent D. Blondel, Jean-Loup Guillaume, Renaud Lambiotte, and Etienne Lefebvre. Fast unfolding of communities in large networks. 2008. URL: https://arxiv.org/abs/0803.0476, doi:10.48550/ARXIV.0803.0476.

[3]

Aaron Clauset, M. E. J. Newman, and Cristopher Moore. Finding community structure in very large networks. Physical Review E, December 2004. URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.1103/PhysRevE.70.066111, doi:10.1103/physreve.70.066111.

[4]

Vikas K. Garg and Tommi Jaakkola. Solving graph compression via optimal transport. 2019. URL: https://arxiv.org/abs/1905.12158, doi:10.48550/ARXIV.1905.12158.

[5]

Anna C. Gilbert and Kirill Levchenko. Compressing network graphs. Year. agilbert@research.att.com and klevchen@cs.ucsd.edu. URL: https://cseweb.ucsd.edu/~klevchen/gl-linkkdd04.pdf.

[6]

Aditya Grover and Jure Leskovec. Node2vec: scalable feature learning for networks. 2016. URL: https://arxiv.org/abs/1607.00653, doi:10.48550/ARXIV.1607.00653.

[7]

Chih-Jen Lin. Projected gradient methods for nonnegative matrix factorization. Neural Computation, 19(10):2756–2779, October 2007. URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.1162/neco.2007.19.10.2756, doi:10.1162/neco.2007.19.10.2756.

[8]

Gergely Palla, Imre Derényi, Illés Farkas, and Tamás Vicsek. Uncovering the overlapping community structure of complex networks in nature and society. Nature, 435(7043):814–818, June 2005. URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.1038/nature03607, doi:10.1038/nature03607.

[9]

Ferran Parés, Dario Garcia-Gasulla, Armand Vilalta, Jonatan Moreno, Eduard Ayguadé, Jesús Labarta, Ulises Cortés, and Toyotaro Suzumura. Fluid communities: a competitive, scalable and diverse community detection algorithm. 2017. URL: https://arxiv.org/abs/1703.09307, doi:10.48550/ARXIV.1703.09307.

[10]

Bryan Perozzi, Rami Al-Rfou, and Steven Skiena. Deepwalk: online learning of social representations. In Proceedings of the 20th ACM SIGKDD international conference on Knowledge discovery and data mining, KDD ’14. ACM, August 2014. URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.1145/2623330.2623732, doi:10.1145/2623330.2623732.

[11]

Vincent A. Traag and Lovro Šubelj. Large network community detection by fast label propagation. Scientific Reports, February 2023. URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.1038/s41598-023-29610-z, doi:10.1038/s41598-023-29610-z.

[12]

Ulrike von Luxburg. A tutorial on spectral clustering. Statistics and Computing, 17(4):395–416, August 2007. URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.1007/s11222-007-9033-z, doi:10.1007/s11222-007-9033-z.

[13]

Fang Zhou. Graph compression. 2019. Accessed: 2024-07-15. URL: https://www.cs.helsinki.fi/u/htoivone/teaching/seminarS10/reports/zhou-graph-compression-v2.pdf, doi:10.1007/978-3-319-77525-8_100146.
